Title: All Inclusive
Writer: Franck Dubosc (screenplay), Guy Laurent (screenplay), Fabien Onteniente (screenplay)
Actors: Franck Dubosc, François-Xavier Demaison, Josiane Balasko, Thierry Lhermitte
Plot: Planted by his fiancee at the airport, Bruno flies away alone for a week in an All Inclusive Caribbean vacation club. Bad news never comes alone, he will have to share his room with Jean-Paul Cisse, eternal bachelor very invading .
